B

broadcast(DeviceData) - Method in class TADK.BusController
this method is used to send broadcast command
BusController - Class in TADK
This is the bus controller class which sets up the device as a bus controller which can accept commands from the host machine and send them to other remote terminals on the bus
BusController(String, int) - Constructor for class TADK.BusController
This will connect you to TADK on given IP and Port and will configure the TADK as BC
BusMonitor - Class in TADK
 
BusMonitor(String, int) - Constructor for class TADK.BusMonitor

channel - Variable in class TADK.DeviceData
(0/1) Channel A/B used by response
connect() - Method in class TADK.DeviceConnection
This method will open a socket and connect to TADK through TCP.

data - Variable in class TADK.DeviceData

decode(char[]) - Static method in class TADK.DeviceData

R

readDeviceData() - Method in class TADK.BusMonitor
 
readDeviceData() - Method in class TADK.RemoteTerminal
This methods reads data from TADK
RemoteTerminal - Class in TADK
This is the Remote Terminal Class, which sets up the TADK as a Remote Terminal, accepts the commands to get/set data words on RT, and also map/unmap Digital inputs and outputs to MIL-STD-1553 data words.
RemoteTerminal(String, int, int) - Constructor for class TADK.RemoteTerminal
this construct will make an object of RT, connects to TADK and configure TADK as RT with given RT address
response - Variable in class TADK.DeviceData
EJAAD Status code of Response as defined in API
rtAddress - Variable in class TADK.DeviceConnection
RT address of TADK if configured as RT, 0 for BC and BM .
rtAddress - Variable in class TADK.DeviceData
(1-30)RT Address

Configure device as a Remote Terminal
TADK_ACTION_SETTRAP - Static variable in class TADK.DeviceConstants
Set Trap for Bus Monitor.A trap will set a specific message to be recorded by the BM.

To un-map digital inputs/outputs (DIOS) from a particular sub-address.
TADK_ACTION_UNSET_DIOS - Static variable in class TADK.DeviceConstants
To Unset(Low) the specific digital output.
TADK_ACTION_UNSETTRAP - Static variable in class TADK.DeviceConstants
Unset trap for Bus Monitor.
TADK_ACTION_VECT - Static variable in class TADK.DeviceConstants
Transmit/Receive from Rx or Tx Vectors
TADK_BC_TO_RT - Static variable in class TADK.DeviceConstants
Set TxRx Bit to 0 for BC to RT command
TADK_COMMAND_CONFIG - Static variable in class TADK.DeviceConstants
CONFIG command is used to configure the device and to set traps in BM mode.
TADK_COMMAND_GET - Static variable in class TADK.DeviceConstants
The GET command is used to retrieve data from the device.
TADK_COMMAND_RTRT - Static variable in class TADK.DeviceConstants
RT to RT command is used for RT to RT transfers.
TADK_COMMAND_SET - Static variable in class TADK.DeviceConstants
The SET command is used to set transmit data on the device.
